metadata.name: Memorandum of Understanding
metadata.author: Agreements Protocol
metadata.description: Template for non-binding memorandum of understanding between two parties

controller.name: Manifesto Controller
controller.description: Ethereum address of the manifesto controller

content.data:
# MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING

**BETWEEN PARTY A:**

<u>${variables.partyAName}</u> (Party A Name)

<u>${variables.partyAEthAddress}</u> (Party A Address)

**AND PARTY B:**

<u>${variables.partyBName}</u> (Party B Name)

<u>${variables.partyBEthAddress}</u> (Party B Address)

**EFFECTIVE DATE:**

<u>${variables.effectiveDate}</u> (Effective Date)

## 1. INTRODUCTION

This Memorandum of Understanding ("MOU") is entered into by and between Party A and Party B (collectively referred to as the "Parties").

The purpose of this MOU is to identify the roles and responsibilities of each Party.

## 2. SCOPE OF COOPERATION

<u>${variables.scope}</u>
(Scope)

## 3. RESPONSIBILITIES
   - Maintain regular communication regarding the progress of collaborative activities.
   - Designate representatives to coordinate the implementation of this MOU.
   - Share relevant information and resources necessary for the successful implementation of this MOU.
   - Acknowledge the contribution of the other Party in all public communications related to activities conducted under this MOU.

## 4. TERM AND TERMINATION

4.1 This MOU shall become effective on the date of the last signature below and shall remain in effect for a period of ${variables.termDuration} unless terminated earlier.

4.2 Either Party may terminate this MOU by providing written notice to the other Party.

4.3 Termination of this MOU shall not affect the completion of any activities already in progress, unless otherwise agreed by the Parties.

## 5. CONFIDENTIALITY

5.1 During the course of this MOU, the Parties may share confidential and proprietary information with each other. Each Party agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all information designated as confidential by the disclosing Party and shall not disclose such information to any third party without the prior written consent of the disclosing Party.

## 6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

6.1 This MOU does not transfer any intellectual property rights between the Parties.

6.2 Each Party shall retain all rights, title, and interest in its own intellectual property.

6.3 Any intellectual property created jointly by the Parties during the course of activities under this MOU shall be owned jointly by the Parties, with specific terms to be negotiated in good faith and documented in a separate written agreement.

## 7. SIGNATURES

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have executed this Memorandum of Understanding as of the Effective Date.

<u>${variables.partyASignature}</u>
(Party A Signature)

<u>${variables.partyBSignature}</u>
(Party B Signature)

By signing, I confirm that I have read, understood, and agree to be legally bound by all terms of this agreement.

INITIALIZED.name: Manifesto Initialized
INITIALIZED.description: The manifesto has been created and initialized with a controller. Ready to be activated.

ACTIVE.name: Agreement is accepting signatures
ACTIVE.description: The manifesto accepts signatures and can be deactivated by the controller.

INACTIVE.name: Agreement is no longer accepting signatures
INACTIVE.description: This state is reached when the controller deactivates the agreement and can be reactivated.

initialize.name: Initialize
initialize.description: Initialize the manifesto with the controller
